content: directly under and a few stitches down frog bucket hat step 3 sew the first cheek onto the hat using the tail left on the eye i like to go through the back loops of the cheek and both loops on the hat base to help with the way it lays step 4 tie off and weave in end repeat for other cheek sew your smile in the way that works best for you and you are done enjoy your finished project and don t forget to tag me @create_with_caitlyn
